name: Fuelless (GMTK Jam)
description:
Moving, shooting, and getting hit all drain from your fuel bar, if your fuel runs out you are forced into spectator mode for the rest of the battle.

You don't have enough fuel to defeat every enemy before losing control of your craft, so work together with your AI teammates to secure a victory.

Controls:

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Move

Esc - Menu

Epilepsy Warning - This game contains flashing lights and images that could cause discomfort or seizures.

Programming - Andrew Roulst

Art - Casey Gorsuch
